channel.title: Projects on Md. Jehadul Karim (Sabit)
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Md. Jehadul Karim (Sabit)

item.title: AKash
item.description: AKash is a simple Banking Application using Java & JavaFX Dependencies JDK 11+ JAVAFX for Java 9+ How to run? In the release folder, you’ll find Jar Files Edit the script files (.bat for windows/.sh for linux) according to your settings Execute the script files (First Server, then Client) How to use You can use command line of Server to execute ADMIN works

item.title: Corona Update
item.description: An Android App which shows current situation of corona all over the world. It shows, Total Number of Infected People Total Number of Recovered People Total number of Active cases Total number of Death To use the app, you have to be conncted to the Internet. The app gets data from the Internet. To avoid unneccesary complexity, I didn’t add an other facilities like auto refresh. You can refresh manually by closing and opening the app again.

item.title: Messenger
item.description: A Simple Multi-Client Messenger with Java Socket Networking… [ Java Executable Link Given Below ] Just like any other messenger, It has Sign Up and Log in Sorting User Depending on Recent Activity Unread Message Batch Real time message update (with Customizable Frequency 1Hz) Black Theme :3 Screenshots

item.title: Infinite Runner 2D
item.description: Infinite Runner 2D is a 2D game using C Programming Language and iGraphics - An OpenGL Wrapper. The game is about a boy keeps running and running, in his way he faces two types of obsacles. He needs to jump to avoid collisin. He can throw a Kunai to destroy one kind of object. But this throwing comes at a cost, 100 point is deducted each time it is thrown.
